author: Warhammer
description:

title: The Big Warhammer Summer Preview - 18th of July 2025

author: Warhammer
description:
Monochrome is a fancy word for painting stuff in black and white, so today Jake will show you how to do this and, crucially, make your models look great at the same time. Who knows – maybe there will even be a mysterious THIRD colour introduced? Watch and see!

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Basilicanum Grey
Black Legion 
Blood Angels Red

Base:
Corax White 
Mechanicus Standard Grey

Layer:
Administratum Grey
Dawnstone 
Ulthuan Grey 
White Scar 

Shade:
Soulblight Grey

Technical:
Ardcoat
Contrast Medium

Brushes:
M Base
M Layer
M Shade
S Layer

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammerofficial
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/
-
title: Making Monochrome Models! | Warhammer

author: Warhammer
description:
Adrenaline-fueled combat racing in the brutal Warhammer 40,000 universe! Drive ferocious vehicles equipped with powerful weapons and abilities into a full-throttle battle to the death. Speed Freeks is a fresh, Ork-y take on vehicle combat that you’ve never seen before. WAAAGH! Check out the latest gameplay trailer, packed with wore stunts. more dakka and MORE WAAAGH! 💥 Double scrap until 10th July and grab 20% off today! 🔥 Buy Now: http://s.team/a/2078450
